text: Mouse anti - FLAG ( M2 ) and anti - β - actin antibodies were purchased from Sigma - Aldrich ( St . Louis , MO , USA ) . Mouse anti - V5 and anti - HA ( Y11 ) antibodies were purchased from Life Technologies ( Grand Island , NY , USA ) and Santa Cruz Biotechnology ( Dallas , TX , USA ) , respectively . Rabbit anti - IRF3 and anti - phospho - IRF3 ( Ser 386 ) antibodies were purchased from IBL - America ( Minneapolis , MN , USA ) .
